title: (Tues Full) Scuba Steve's Life-Changing Family Decision + Abby's Worst Date Story + Lunchbox's Restaurant Issue
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Scuba Steve's Life-Changing Family Decision + Abby's Worst Date Story + Lunchbox's Restaurant Issue
description:
Scuba Steve shares a life-changing decision happening in his family at the end of this month. We discuss the pros and cons. We got an update from Abby about her dating life, and she shares her worst date story. Eddie, Lunchbox and Scuba all went to lunch with their kids. Lunchbox wasn't prepared when the waitress came to take the order and say's she was rude...was he wrong not to tip her?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
